tool_description: Retrieves GPS tracking data from deployed collars using various communication methods including satellite, cellular, and VHF download.

communication_type.description: Communication method: satellite, cellular, or vhf

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Collar not found: The specified collar_id does not exist in the system.
Communication failure: Unable to establish connection with collar using specified method.
Invalid communication type: Use satellite, cellular, or vhf.
No data available: No GPS fixes found for the specified time period.
Collar inactive: The collar appears to be non-functional or powered down.
usage: Provide collar_id, start_date, and end_date. Optionally specify communication_type. The tool retrieves all available GPS fixes within the date range.

total_fixes.description: Total number of GPS fixes retrieved

timestamps.description: Array of fix timestamps in ISO 8601 format

latitudes.description: Array of latitude values in decimal degrees

longitudes.description: Array of longitude values in decimal degrees

fix_quality.description: Array of GPS fix quality indicators
